name: Invincible Starts with a Severed Hand
author: UpdatingStatusOnGoingTypeManhwa
content: The weakest awakened one, Chu Mingxuan, is swallowed by a giant beast. On the brink of death, he unexpectedly inherits a system, thus embarking on a long journey of continuous strengthening towards godhood. But how are awakened ones formed, and where does the system come from? Beneath the calm surface, undercurrents surge, and the worldâ€™s bloody great revolution is about to begin.Original Webtoon
